description:
Naruto and Iruka are left in a daze by the power of Mizuki`s chakra. Naruto counters with a jutsu but is quickly rebuffed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Confrontation of Fate! You Will Not Defeat Me
Innen no Taiketsu! Omae ni Ore wa Taosenee
หน้าอย่างนายโค่นฉันไม่ได้หรอก
因縁の対決! オマエにオレは倒せねえ
